Ragnar looked at her quizzically.

Ragnar: But how can she be a transformer? She looks so different from
you, and even from Tyrael and his soldiers. My scanner barely show her
on magres, but they show her as red hot on infrared. Why is that?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
<cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "A transformer, actually." Wheeljack points out.  He switches his 
> transmitter for a med-scanner.  "She seems to be okay, just knocked 
> out when the ship hit."  Looking around, he recalls Ragner's earlier 
> question.  "I'd say this rig could fly again, with some work.  Maybe 
> this chick could tell us what happened ..."
> 
> He kneels to examine the pilot more closely, looking for any injuries.
> 
> OOC: Wheeljack-X should be recognizeable to Maxima whenever she wakes 
> up - he looks much like the original Wheeljack, only with a second 
> shoulder turret and a rocketpack.  He's also got an obvious Autobot 
> insignia on his chestplate.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
> <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Ragnar: What is that? A tiger-girl? A mutant?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > > In the cockpit of the crashed shuttle lay the figure of a Techno
> > Organic with 
> > > an alt mode of a white tiger. Laying unconscious in the center of 
> the 
> > > cockpit. 
> > > 
> > > There were no markings upon her except that of the black stripes.
